synopsis.text: Kei Enjoji, the son of a powerful Osaka mafia don, and Ranmaru Samejima, a talented and attractive school fencing champion, share a deep and loving relationship that began in middle school. Their bond is tested when Ranmaru is accidentally run over by a car meant for Kei, forcing him to abandon his fencing career. Despite this setback, their love endures, but new challenges arise when Kei's half-brother, Sagano, enrolls in their college to be closer to Ranmaru, his secret love. As Sagano's presence stirs up conflict and hidden emotions, Kei and Ranmaru must confront the complexities of their relationship and determine if their love can withstand the trials that come their way.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
